splash-loggedinas:
{{ignore}}
Toggle for dropdown for personal tools menu for logged-in users
splash-userpage: Label for userpage link in user dropdown
splash-talkpage: Label for talkpage link in user dropdown
splash-page-tools: More accurate label for page actions dropdown for how we're using it here (tools and actions)
splash-talk: Active verb label for talkpage page action link
splash-toolbox: Label for toolbox when grouped in with page tools on custom mainpage
site-banner:
{{ignore}}
Used as the banner text for the site.
global-links-menu:
{{ignore}}
Optional menu that appears at the top left of the skin, above the banner. Parses like a mini sidebar.
content-footer:
{{ignore}}
Optional footer content to display on all pages after the page content.
